text: phir jab usake yahaan bachchee paida huee to usane kaha, "mere rab! mere yahaan to ladakee paida huee hai." - allaah to jaanata hee tha jo kuchh usake yahaan paida hua tha. aur vah ladaka us ladakee kee tarah nahin ho sakata - "aur mainne usaka naam marayam rakha hai aur main use aur usakee santaan ko tiraskrt shaitaan (ke upadrav) se surakshit rakhane ke lie teree sharan mein detee hoon.
